name: ML Campbell HP WB Production Lacquer Primer
description: ML Campbell HP WB Production Lacquer Primer is a fast drying and easy sanding pigmented primer made with European acrylic copolymer resin technology. HP Water Borne Production Primer is specially formulated to be used as the first coat under HP Water Borne Production Lacquer Pigmented, but it can also provide an ideal smooth base coat for other water borne pigmented topcoats. HP Water Borne Production Primer is an ideal primer for wood and MDF on commercial and residential millwork, furniture and display fixtures.
